summary: Depressed by his loneliness, Paul-André, a shy and wealthy man, offers to rent the family of a good-natured woman with two kids in exchange for settling her debts.
cast: Benoît Poelvoorde|Virginie Efira|François Morel|Philippe Rebbot|Pauline Serieys|Calixte Broisin-Doutaz|Edith Scob|Nancy Tate|Nathalie Gessier|Taïra|Rémy Roubakha|Xavier Mathieu|Gwendoline Hamon|Mathilde Wambergue|Bigg Shake|Salima Boutebal|Stéphanie Bataille|Hervé Terrisse|Walter Shnorkell|Axel Cygor|Stéphane Lydo|Florian Buteaux|Nathalie de Renty-Bauwens|Damien Biancotto|Damien Rangdet|Daniel Aubé|Eric Moreau
keywords: singing in a car|kiosk|hit with a soccer ball|soccer ball|mother son relationship
title: Una familia de alquiler
